Stratified random sampling

Source: R/helper_autoplot.R
strat_sample_folds.Rd

Stratified random sampling

Usage

strat_sample_folds(data, col, n)

Arguments

data

(data.table)
Data

col

(character(1))
Column to stratify on.

n

(integer)
Sample size per group
